function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of coordination and harmonization in COVID-19 patient cohorts","Impact":"Inhibited deep and sensitive analysis of patient data","Mitigation":"Establish clear guidelines and standards for data sharing and harmonization","Technologies":"Data management and harmonization platforms","People":"Scientific community, researchers, and stakeholders","Owner":"Scientific community and research organizations"},{"Description":"Sensitive participant-level clinical data usage and privacy concerns","Impact":"Risk of privacy breaches and unethical use of data","Mitigation":"Implement controlled access and usage guidelines for sensitive data","Technologies":"Data privacy protection tools and secure data sharing platforms","People":"Researchers and data custodians","Owner":"Research institutions and data management organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of interoperability between community-developed data standards","Impact":"Difficulty in selecting and using data standards, hindering scientific development","Mitigation":"Develop a meta-level interoperability framework for data standards","Technologies":"Interoperability platforms and data standardization tools","People":"Data standardization organizations, research institutions","Owner":"Data standardization organizations"}]}
